Skill.label: Auras (change Precision and Vit Levels as needed)
Combustion Proc (needs Trap bc. Ancestral Bond)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xD02090!!!!!!MANA RESERVATION IS NEGATIVE BECAUSE OF THE DIVINE BLESSING SETUP, IT IS BUGGED!!!!!!^7
For Item-Setups:
Decent Gear belongs to "Endgame" passive tree Great Gear belongs to the "Cluster-Endgame" passive tree
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
^xD02090^xE05030THINGS TO LOOK OUT FOR^7:^7 (for more infos watch the BIG Mistakes to Avoid section in the Full Build Guide)
1) ^xE05030Do NOT^7 get any added fire damage to attacks on ANY of your gear pieces! (example '1-5 fire damage) You can check this by looking at your ^x70FF70Explosive Arrow ^7tooltip, the only ^xB97123Fire^7 damage you should see is for the Explosions, nothing else.
2) ^xE05030Do NOT^7 get any Pierce, Chain or Fork. Only the last enemy hit gets a Fuse, so you will COMPLETELY BRICK your character!!!!!!!!!!
3) ^xE05030Do NOT^7 ignore Accuracy, you need 100% chance to hit, because ^x70FF70Explosive Arrow^7 is an attack skill, otherwise your fuses will sometimes not hit the enemy.
4) ^xE05030Do NOT ^7have a bow with lower than 1.5 base attack speed. Do not trust Path of Building for fuse calculation! ^xAF6025 Xoph's Inception/Nurture^7^7 are really bad for the build, ^xE05030NEVER^7 use them!!!!!!!!
5) ^xE05030Do NOT ^7use^7 ^x70FF70Barrage Support^7. It doesn't work the way you think it does!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^xFFFF77LEVELING SECTION ^7
In this section I will write down some specifics regarding ^xD02090^7Act1-10^7^7 progression. There is also a whole video dedicated to this here:
^xAF6025Some basic info: If you need several of the same quest reward gems, you can take one of them and buy the other ones from the corresponding Act vendor (for example Nessa in Act 1) ^7 -------------------- ^xFFFF77Level 2-3^7
The first skill you will use is ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse^7 (enemy at the gate reward after killing hillock) The freezes will keep you alive until you get your first gearpieces.
^xFFFF77Level 4-28^7
Afer that your setup will revolve around 3 fire skills:
1) ^x3F6DB3^x8888FF^x3F6DB3^x7070FFPurifying Flame^7^7^7^7 (buy this gem from Nessa)
+^x7070FFArcane Surge Support^7 (reward from the "enemy at the gate" quest, lvl 2) +^x7070FFCombustion Support^7 (reward from "the Caged Brute", lvl 8)
Later at Level 18 you will replace ^x7070FFCombustion Support^7 with ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 ^x7070FFSupport^7 (reward from "Sharp and Cruel in Act 2)
2) ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 ( buy after "Breaking some eggs" quest, lvl 4)
+ ^x8888FF^x7070FFSummon Phantasm Support^7^7 (reward from "Mercy Mission, lvl 4) , replace this one later at around Level 18 with Faster Casting Support + ^x7070FFCombustion Support^7 (reward from "the Caged Brute", lvl 8) + ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 (reward from "Sharp and Cruel in Act 2)
Later at Level 18 you will replace ^x7070FFCombustion Support^7 with "^x7070FFFaster Casting Support^7" (buy from Helena in A2)
3) ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 (reward from "Breaking some eggs" quest, lvl 4)
+ ^x7070FFEfficacy ^7 + ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 (reward from "Sharp and Cruel in Act 2)
As soon as you are Level 16 and you finished the "The Root of the Problem" quest, take ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7 and replace ^x7070FFPurifying Flame^7. The support gems stay the same. ------------------------------------------------------------ ^xD02090^xFFFF77The following recipe will MASSIVELY help you throughout the acts: ( Do NOT skip this recipe, it will more than DOUBLE your damage)
Flat damage wand recipe: any magic wand + orb of alteration + white ruby ring = magic wand with added damage to fire spells (level 8 requirement) Flat damage wand recipe: any magic wand + orb of alteration + rare ruby ring = magic wand with added damage to fire spells (level 20 requirement)
If you need a Ruby Ring for the recipe: Iron Ring + any red gem = Ruby Ring
If you need Orb of Alterations for the recipe make sure you sell rare gear that is identified, that will give you alteration^7 ^xFFFF77shards! ^7^7 -----------------------------------------
Once you are Level 16, take both ^xE05030Herald of Purity^7 and ^xE05030Herald of Ash^7 and use them as your Auras! (Intruders in Black Quest Reward)
Take ^xE05030^x7070FFFlammability^7^7 at Level 24 and use it whenever you are facing a boss!
^xFFFF77At Level 28, do the Fixture of Fate Quest in the Library to get access to all gems, now buy the following gems if you want to transition to Explosive Arrow at Level 32:^7
^x70FF70Explosive Arrow^7 ^xE05030Ballista Totem Support^7 2x ^x70FF70Faster Attacks Support^7 ^x70FF70Grace^7 ^xE05030Determination^7 ^xE05030Defiance Banner^7 ^x7070FFLightning Spire Trap^7 ^x70FF70Frenzy^7
Also go to the Act1 Vendor and buy a ^x70FF70Precision^7 (already leveled, in library it would be Level 1)
---------------------------------------------
^xE05030^xD02090Here you have to make a decision^7^7, you can follow the tried and true ^x70FF70Cremation^7/^x7070FFArmageddon Brand^7 and transition to EA at maps (lots of guides on this leveling method on youtube) or you tranisiton whenever you have the Uniques: ^xAF6025Storm Cloud^7 and ^xAF6025Skirmish^7 When you can buy those will depend on how rewarding the league mechanic is, how many people play this build and also wether you got a chaos or two dropped already.
You CAN also respec with only a ^xB97123Storm Cloud^7 if you like to use your main skill early (I will do this) but just know that the build will feel a little slower at first! ^x70FF70Explosive Arrow^7 needs some levels to get going so don't stress about damage too much, just make sure you have all the moving parts correct!
At ^xFFFF77Level 32^7+, do your Labyrinth and get the Elementalist Ascendancy! As your first points, choose "Shaper of Flames"
You need to be ^xFFFF77Level 38^7 at the earliest so transition!
If you want to transition once you have a ^xAF6025Storm Cloud^7 and a ^xAF6025Skirmish^7, you need the following:
4-Link (important, dont use a 3-link, if you do not have a 4-link with these colours, don't tranisiton)
^x70FF70Explosive Arrow^7 +^xE05030Ballista Support^7 +^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 +^xE05030^x7070FFIgnite Proliferation^7
4-Link (if you don't have another 4link selfcast ^x7070FFFlammability^7 for now) ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 +^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 +^x7070FFhextouch Support^7 (level 38) +^x7070FFFlammability^7
2-link (You don't deal any damage, so a Trap has to apply Combustion)
^x7070FFLighning Spire Trap^7 +^x7070FFCombustion Support^7
As your Auras, for now you will be using:
^x7070FFPurity of Elements ^xC8C8C8(Defenses) or^7 ^x7070FFWrath^7 (damage) ^x70FF70Precision^7 (IMPORTANT, you NEED this for ACCURACY)
Only use ^xE05030Determination^7 + ^x70FF70Grace^7 + ^xE05030Defiance Banner^7 later, once you start feeling squishy!
Use the ^x7070FFLightning Golem^7 for increased attack speed if you have the socket space!
^xFFFF77Ascendancy Order^7:
1) Shaper of Flames 2) Mastermind of Discord 3) Heart of Destruction 4) Bastion of Elements
^xFFFF77Good Leveling Uniques^7:
- ^xAF6025Storm Cloud^7 - ^xAF6025Skirmish ^7 - ^xAF6025Tabula Rasa^7
For any further information after this transition, watch the leveling video here:
Also, do look at the Act 1-10 Passive Trees if you need guidance on which passive points to take!
Wish you all the best at Leaguestart! <3

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
Get your resists on your gear anywhere (suffixes) +100% to all elemental resistances
!!Use the notes section!!
